changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tables.address ( id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY, customer_id UUID NOT NULL, street UUID NOT NULL, building_number VARCHAR(10), flat_number INTEGER, office VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, comment VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES tables.customer (id) );
